name: Press D to Die
description:
Press D to die

Die with just the simple press of a button! Unlike in real life, suicide will actually help you by leaving behind a corpse. A corpse can be used in cooperation with other abilities in various combinations in order to reach previously unreachable places.

Solve problems in your own way

With a few exceptions, any challenge in which you can place corpses could be solved in a way that we as developers didn't think to be possible.

This is because of the the abilities the Player Character has and especially how these interact with corpses
*add example gifs here*

3 distinct Levels

With a total first time playtime of about 45min to 1:30h (depending on familiarity with 2d platformers), each of the 3 levels has distinct themes of gameplay, visual aesthetic and original music.

Though the game may seem short compared to others, we can confidently say that it's the unique gameplay makes up for just that.
